oai_dc:dc.dc:title: TXM
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: TXM is a Unicode - XML & TEI compatible text/corpus analysis environment and graphical client based on the CQP search engine and the R statistical environment (http://textometrie.ens-lyon.fr/?lang=en).
